item.title: About
item.description:
About Andromeda Law

Modern Legal Services for Today’s Clients

Andromeda Law was founded with a simple premise: legal services should adapt to how people actually live and work today. As an online-only law firm serving clients across Ontario, we’ve eliminated the inefficiencies of traditional law practice while maintaining the highest standards of professional service.

Our Approach

We believe that:

  • Your Time Matters: Legal services shouldn’t require taking time off work for in-person meetings when a video call would serve the same purpose.
  • Transparency is Essential: From our pricing to our processes, we believe in being clear and direct about what to expect.
  • Technology Should Serve You: We leverage modern tools not because they’re new, but because they make your experience better and more efficient.
  • Quality Doesn’t Require Overhead: By operating virtually, we eliminate unnecessary costs while maintaining professional excellence.

What Sets Us Apart

Online-Only Practice

Unlike traditional firms that added virtual services during COVID-19, we were designed from the ground up to operate online. This isn’t an adaptation—it’s our foundation.

item.title: Cancellation Policy
item.description:
Cancellation Policy

At Andromeda Law, we understand that schedules can change unexpectedly. Our cancellation and rescheduling policies are designed to be fair and considerate for both our clients and our practice.

item.title: Collections
item.description:
Collections

Unpaid debts can impact your financial stability and business operations. At Andromeda Law, we offer efficient and legal solutions to help you recover what you’re owed.

Our Collections Services

  • Demand Letters: Issuing formal demands for payment to initiate the recovery process.
  • Negotiation: Engaging with debtors to reach amicable repayment agreements.
  • Legal Action: Filing claims in Small Claims Court or Superior Court, depending on the amount owed.
  • Enforcement: Taking steps to enforce judgments, such as wage garnishments or property liens.

Our Approach

  • Prompt Action: Acting quickly to increase the likelihood of successful recovery.
  • Professional Conduct: Maintaining professionalism to preserve business relationships when possible.
  • Transparent Fees: Offering clear information about costs associated with the collections process.

If you need assistance recovering debts, contact us to discuss your options, or use our online booking tool to view available time slots and choose one that works for you.

item.title: Estates Litigation
item.description:
Estates Litigation

Dealing with disputes over wills and estates can be emotionally taxing and legally complex. At Andromeda Law, we provide compassionate and strategic representation to help you navigate these sensitive matters.

Our Services in Estates Litigation

  • Will Contests: Challenging or defending the validity of a will based on factors like undue influence, lack of testamentary capacity, or improper execution.
  • Dependant Support Claims: Assisting dependants who have been inadequately provided for in a will to secure fair support from the estate.
  • Executor and Trustee Disputes: Resolving conflicts involving executors, trustees, and beneficiaries over the management and distribution of estate assets.
  • Estate Administration Issues: Addressing concerns related to the administration of the estate, including asset valuation and debt settlement.

Our Approach

  • Compassionate Guidance: We understand the emotional complexities involved and provide support with sensitivity.
  • Strategic Planning: Developing tailored legal strategies to achieve your goals efficiently.
  • Clear Communication: Keeping you informed at every stage to ensure you understand your options.

If you’re facing an estates dispute, contact us to discuss how we can assist you, or use our online booking tool to view available time slots and choose one that works for you.

item.title: Small Claims Flat Fee Structure
item.description:
Small Claims Court Fee Structure

Small Claims Court is designed to handle monetary disputes between $10,000 and $35,000 in a more streamlined way than Superior Court. At Andromeda Law, we’ve developed a predictable flat-fee structure that breaks the process into clear stages, helping you understand both the costs and process upfront.

Cost Overview

Using a $25,000 claim as an example:

  • Initial Consultation: $300
  • Claim Filing Stage: $1,875 (7.5% of claim amount)
  • Settlement Conference Stage: $1,875 (7.5% of claim amount)
  • Disbursements: Typically $200-400 (court fees, process service, etc.) Total: Approximately $4,250-4,450
